name: Home Screen Sections
description: A Jellyfin plugin which allows users to update their web client's home screen to be a bit more dynamic and more 'Netflixy'. Includes sections like Continue Watching, Next Up, Recently Added, Because You Watched, Watch Again, Genre-based sections, and integrations with Jellyseerr for Discover and My Requests sections.
overview: Customize your Jellyfin home screen with dynamic sections like Netflix
